channel.title: Comments on: AQ War Effort Rankings

item.title: By: Broken Toys » Blog Archive » Win A Dream Date With An Uberguild!
item.dc:creator: Broken Toys » Blog Archive » Win A Dream Date With An Uberguild!
item.description: [...] World of Warcraft’s recent patch introduced a server-wide quest for opening the new uber-dungeon, called, varyingly, “a dynamic cooperative quest“, “holy crap, that’s a lots of hunting and gathering“, “worst. quest. ever.“, “sweet, new NPCs we can gank to grief everyone“, “yeah, you guys get right on that!“, and the rational response, “omg, the auction house market in magic items has fallen through the floor” (since the turnins on the gathered items reward you with random magic loot). [...]
item.content:encoded: […] World of Warcraft’s recent patch introduced a server-wide quest for opening the new uber-dungeon, called, varyingly, “a dynamic cooperative quest“, “holy crap, that’s a lots of hunting and gathering“, “worst. quest. ever.“, “sweet, new NPCs we can gank to grief everyone“, “yeah, you guys get right on that!“, and the rational response, “omg, the auction house market in magic items has fallen through the floor” (since the turnins on the gathered items reward you with random magic loot). […]
